title: Cauliflower mash

ingredients.content: 25 g Parmesan cheese, cut into pieces (3 cm)
700 g cauliflower, cut into florets (2-3 cm)

preparations.content: Place Parmesan into mixing bowl and grate <b>5 sec/speed 9<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
Place cauliflower and garlic into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 6<b>.
Add salt, pepper, ghee and reserved Parmesan and blend <b>30 sec/speed 7<b>. Serve as a side with your favourite main.

hintsAndTricks: You can replace the ghee with butter or oil in this recipe.
